mapper.insert: insert into product (categoryId, brandId, productName, productImg, subtitle, introduce, price, stock, measure, status, createTime, updateTime) values (#{categoryId}, #{brandId}, #{productName}, #{productImg}, #{subtitle}, #{introduce}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{measure}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime});
mapper.update: update product set categoryId = #{categoryId}, brandId = #{brandId}, productName = #{productName}, productImg = #{productImg}, subtitle = #{subtitle}, introduce = #{introduce}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, measure = #{measure}, status = #{status}, createTime = #{createTime}, updateTime = #{updateTime};
